alert.note: Alert for Eastern Culberson County; Van Horn and Highway 54 Corridor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 22 at 2:57AM CDT until March 22 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON CDT /11 AM MDT/ TODAY TO 7 PM CDT /6 PM MDT/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Southeast New Mexico Plains, Van Horn and Highway 54 Corridor, and Eastern Culberson. * WHEN...From noon CDT /11 AM MDT/ today to 7 PM CDT /6 PM MDT/ this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Culberson County; Van Horn and Highway 54 Corridor
